content:
# The recipe for a transport belt requires:
# - 1 iron plate
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# Since I have 1 iron plate and 2 iron gear wheels in my inventory, I can craft 1 transport belt.

# I will proceed to craft the transport belt now.
craft_item(Prototype.TransportBelt, quantity=1)  # Craft 1 transport belt.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
